review_data.title: Kenia meets Thailand
review_data.content: immer wieder gut, das kenianische Linsengericht, aber auch das Thai Curry!! der Gastgeber ist sehr sympatisch; das kleine Lokal gleich...More

review_data.title: Urlaub in Afrika
review_data.content: Jedes mal ein Erlebnis - wie Ferien. Familiäre Atmosphäre und leckeres Essen! Eine spannende Alternative zu den austauschbaren Asiaten/Italienern -...More

review_data.title: Eintauchen und geniessen
review_data.content: Das African Queen besuchten wir mit unseren (erwachsenen) Kindern und mit Freunden, darunter einem gebürtigen Angolaner. Da muss das Essen...More

review_data.title: Yummy food, super nice host!
review_data.content: I enjoyed the fresh tasty food. It's a small place with only a few tables. The host is super nice and it's a pleasure to be served with a smile. Thanks!

review_data.title: Einfach fein
review_data.content: Tolles Essen, sehr persönlich, super Chef, kleine aber qualitativ einwandfreie Karte, keine Hektik, toller Ort. Da wird mit Herz gekocht.

review_data.title: Klein aber fein
review_data.content: Sehr netter Wirt. Afrikanische Spezialitäten wie z.B. Kudu Filet erinnern an Ferien in Afrika. Gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.

review_data.title: Great African food experience!
review_data.content: Really tasty and qualitative food with a cosy, quiet dining room atmospehre. Good, genuine and friendly staff. We had a really great evening with my friends and will recommend African Queen to anyone. Thanks alot! :)

review_data.title: Fabulous food! A must try place
review_data.content: Very warm welcome from the owner and fabulous tasting platter. The food is really tasty and quite varied from different places in East and South Africa. A must try without hesitation!!

review_data.title: Sehr Gutes Essen
review_data.content: Interessantes Restaurant. Essen war sehr fein. Mitarbeiter waren sehr Freundlich. Preis Leistung Verhältnis ist gut

review_data.title: The African Queen: A gem.
review_data.content: Just happen to try the African Queen and found it to be a great family run restaurant with a great Curry Lamb dish. Reasonably priced. A great cange of pace from the usual!

review_data.title: Authentisch, klein und fein
review_data.content: Ganz kleines, herziges und authentisch afrikanisches Restaurant. Kleine Speisekarte, zum empfehlen sind Lamm, Barsch und Passionsfruchtmousse wie auch der Schokoladen-Chili...More

review_data.title: Great food, lovely chef
review_data.content: Visited a couple of weeks ago on a cold Saturday evening, when we couldn't find anywhere with a free table for four. Just up the road from our hotel and a very warm and friendly welcome. Not sure what to expect as we hadn't tried...More

review_data.title: Tasty food and very friendly host
review_data.content: I enjoyed the food here a lot, some of the dishes were more unusual than others but they were all tasty. It was also nice to talk to Gerry, the owner of the restaurant. He's very friendly, and is very interesting to talk to.

review_data.title: Authentic African food in very friendly atmosphere
review_data.content: Went there twice already and enjoyed both visits. The food is authentic Aftican and I liked it a lot. Drinks menu rather limited but nice wine at reasonable prices. The owner is a very nice and funny guy who is really open for a chat...More

review_data.title: New tastes
review_data.content: I was there with a big group of friends, we received a very very warm welcome from the owner Jery. People seemed to like their dish, but I wanted to be adventurous and tried mashed green banana (I realized it's not my type but at...More

review_data.title: Excellent home made East African Cuisine
review_data.content: If you are looking for East African food in Zurich, then this restaurant is for you. The restaurant is well located, about 10-15 minutes walking from the main station and easy reachable with public transportation. The restaurant is not very big, rather simple, therefore you...More

review_data.title: Sehr gute afrikanische Küche
review_data.content: kann ich jedem empfehlen, Mittagsmenu günstig und sehr gut. Freundliches Personal. immer wieder gerne

review_data.title: Great service and food.
review_data.content: Gerry, owner of this restaurant is an excellent host and the food delivered was beautifully cooked. We ordered Springbok, because we had never tried it before and it was delicious. African food and all cooked to perfection.
